effect.name: Dilation
effect.description:
Apply dilation effect.
Simulates image dilation, an effect which will enlarge the lightest pixels in the image by replacing the pixel by the local (3x3) maximum.
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.threshold0
1st Plane Threshold
parameter.comment:
Limit the maximum change for each plane.
Default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.

parameter.name: av.threshold1
2nd Plane Threshold
parameter.comment:
Limit the maximum change for each plane.
Default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.

parameter.name: av.threshold2
3rd Plane Threshold
parameter.comment:
Limit the maximum change for each plane.
Default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.

parameter.name: av.threshold3
4th Plane Threshold
parameter.comment:
Limit the maximum change for each plane.
Default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.

parameter.name: av.coordinates
Coordinates
parameter.comment:
Flag which specifies the pixel to refer to.
Default is 255 i.e. all eight pixels are used. Flags to local 3x3 coordinates maps like this: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8
